channel.title: Jonathan Swift on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.
channel.description: Recent content in Jonathan Swift on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.

item.title: 1.) Learn About Lists 2.) See Item 1
item.description: Today in Tedium: David Letterman is retiring soon, and while he didn’t invent the list, he probably did more to ensure its pop-culture legacy than anything _BuzzFeed_ could ever hope. Author and Death and Taxes editor-in-chief Brian Abrams, who wrote a book about Letterman’s NBC career last year, noted that the idea for Letterman’s Top Ten list came as a satire of the then-current obsession with lists in the mass media.
